title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy in a pan.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl until creamy.
Drain spaghetti and mix with pancetta.
Remove from heat and stir in egg-cheese mixture quickly before serving.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until golden and cooked through.
Heat oil in a pan and saut√© onion until soft.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in cream and add the chicken pieces.
Cook for another 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Healthy and delicious avocado spread on toasted bread with toppings.
ingredients: Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, poached egg
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash avocado in a bowl with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture evenly on the toast.
Add optional toppings like sliced cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, or a poached egg.
